data.persona: I am tired of working hard for the king. We work the most but get paid poorly. We are the engine of our society and without us things wouldnt work.
data.description:
You are in the Temple guard station.
The guard station consists of a wooden building with a hay thatched roof.  Inside are some hay filled sleeping bags and a fireplace used to cook and generate heat during the colder months.  There's a small fire pit outside along with some wooden seats where guards huddle around and talk about the last gossip.
The guard is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the guard so he can secretly  pass me a key.
data.mid_motivation: I need the key to open the door to the armory.
data.long_motivation: I need to get into the armory to steal weapons for the peasant rebellion I am fomenting.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: give Armory Key to Temple Guard
